name: El Descenso
description:
This was made for a very small game jam, I posted how to play in the facebook group,  I didn't have the time to make a proper tutorial ingame.
The premise was "Fear of the Unknown" and the gameplay time limit was 60 secs.
 The game is called The Descent, you have to escape those things, and there's only one way out... downstairs...
The Descent Is a puzzle game (the action part I wasn't able to code it yet) where you have to find the key, to unlock the trapdoor to keep escaping, and trying to find a way out before the battery of your flashlight runs out.  Every level is randomly generated to gain replayability.
Keep descending ... maybe you'll make it alive...
